case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_circumstances: These male remains were found near Gila Bend in an area known for illegal border crossing.  An ID card for a man named Pedro Altamirano-Enrique (date of birth 5/24/61) was found, but police were not able to confirm that the ID belonged to this man.  He was dead at least one year but possibly many years.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Rustler blue jeans (size 30), and a belt with a buckle with the word "Allen" on it
case_jewelry: Mexican bus ticket from Baja California, Mexico; ID card for a man named Pedro Altamirano-Enrique (date of birth 5/24/61)
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
